required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

id_info.org_study_id: Role of LTOT in Pateints e ILD

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Oxygen Therapy in Patients With Interstitial Lung Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Role of LTOT in Pateints With ILD

brief_summary.textblock: Study the effect of using long term oxygen therapy in patients with interstitial lung disease and chronic hypoxia

detailed_description.textblock: long term oxygen can be used in patients with interstitial lung disease with hypoxia and the aim of this study is to k ow whether this will improve life style , exercise tolerance in those patients

primary_outcome.description: dyspnea by Modified Medical Research Counsel
Quality of life by st.George questionnaire

study_pop.textblock: patients with ILDs who are prescribed for LTOT between eighteen and seventy years old

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria :
- patients with ILD and hypoxia with SO2<88 at room air and PO2 < or equal 7.3k.pa or < or equal 8 k.pa in presence of lower limb edema , pulmonary hypertension or polycythemia
- age group 18 : 70
Exclusion Criteria :
- Causes of chronic respiratory failure other than ILD.

reference.citation: Cobo-Ibáñez T, López-Longo FJ, Joven B, Carreira PE, Muñoz-Fernández S, Maldonado-Romero V, Larena-Grijalba C, Cubas IL, Muriel ET, Mateos CB, de la Peña Lefebvre PG, Gomez-Gomez A, Nogal LB, Pérez A, Almodovar R, Lojo L, Ruiz-Gutiérrez L, López-Robledillo JC, García de Yébenes MJ, Nuño-Nuño L. Long-term pulmonary outcomes and mortality in idiopathic inflammatory myopathies associated with interstitial lung disease. Clin Rheumatol. 2019 Mar;38(3):803-815. doi: 10.1007/s10067-018-4353-2. Epub 2018 Nov 3.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Resident at chest department Assiut university
